Name: Fig Tart
Description: Simple snacks that beg you to eat more than one.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Refrigerio simple que te obliga a comer más de uno.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 둘이 먹다 하나가 죽어도 모르는 맛.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Einfache Snacks- eins ist nie genug.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un simple en-cas qui vous supplie d'en manger un autre.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: ついもう一切れおかわりをしてしまう。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Lanches simples que imploram para você comer mais de um.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Простая закуска, так и просящая съесть ещё один кусочек.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Birden fazla ye diye yalvaran basit atıştırmalıklar.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 无花果馅饼。简单的零食，一次根本吃不够。
